network-error-click-to-resume: 网络故障，请单击恢复测试
question: 问题
click-any-word-to-create-one: 单击任意单词添加注释
note-delete-failure: 删除注释失败，再试一次
log-in-to-create-own-notes: 登录以创建自己的笔记
word-not-in-note-yet: 这个单词尚未添加注释
note-save-failure: 注释添加失败，再试一次
annotations-popup-info-text:
单机任意单词添加注释！

对任意单词或文本——你认为有趣或者重要的语言性质——添加注释
click-arrow-buttons-to-expand-shrink: 单击书名号按钮展开或收缩文本注释
competition-mode-info-text: 在竞赛模式下，你将与一个与你语言能力接近的机器人进行比赛。有人到达故事终点比赛就结束，最终正确答案数最多的就是赢家、
participle-base-exer: 形动词基础练习（较简单）
Accusative/ergative subject + Impersonal: 主体四格+无人称动词：”Васю тошнит“
Dative subject + adverb: 'мне (стало) пл: 主体三格+副词：我感觉很糟糕/我需要/我感到无聊。
Dative subject + impersonal verb: 'мне и: 主体三格+无人称动词：我适合/我讨厌/我很幸运/我……足够。
Dative subject + impersonal-reflexive ne: 主体三格+无人称动词/消极反身动词：他不会有好结果的。
Dative subject + impersonal-reflexive ve: 主体三格+无人称动词/反身动词：我喜欢/我觉得/我不得不。
Expressions of time, place and manner. P: 时间地点行为方式。无前置词词组。
Joint vs. separate spelling of negation: 否定词"не"与词的连写和分写。
Noun. Case and preposition government: 名词。格与前置词的支配关系。
Phrase 'забыть, успеть, удаться' + infin: 组”忘记，来得及，成功“+动词不定式
Phrase 'нельзя, невозможно, не могу' + i: 组”禁止，不可能，我不能“+动词不定式
Phrase 'уметь, нравиться, любить,...' +: 组”善于，喜欢，爱，……“+动词不定式
Preposition. Case government (of Noun+Pr: 前置词。名词与代词接格关系
V declension: other (невежа/...): 第五变格：其他(粗鲁的人/...)
Verb. Case and preposition government: 动词。接格关系和前置词关系。
controlled-exercise-popup-text:
单击练习按钮（红色区域），将其添加到测试组。如果想对该段落进行更多的练习，请按按纽” 重新生成练习“——这样将保留原来的练习，并生成新的练习。

当段落已经进行足够多练习时，点击绿色按钮”保存段落“以进行下一段落练习
no-flashcards-yet-when-you-practice-a-st:
这个故事没有单词卡。
请点击文本中不认识的单词，它们将被添加到单词卡里！
pay-attention-to-diacritics: 请注意变音符号！你写了"{answer}"，正确的形式是"{normalizedCorrect}"。
pay-attention-to-spelling: 请注意你的拼写！你写了"{answer}"，正确的形式是"{levenshtein Correct}"。
this-will-permanently-remove-this-flashc: 这将永久删除这张单词卡，你确定要继续吗？
server_busy: 对不起，服务器正忙，请稍候再试
server-issues: 服务器遇到问题，请稍候再试
multiple-email-separate-instructions: 请使用逗号或者空格分隔邮箱地址
cant-find-group: 无法找到群组，请确认您是否选择了正确的语言!
create-group-message: 创建一个新群组来分享文本，或者跟踪学生的学习进度
groups-for-only-registered-users: 只有注册用户才能创建或者加入群组，请注册后再进行操作
token-copied: 群组密码已复制到剪贴板
join-group-message: 加入由教师创建的群组
select-a-student-from-list: 从列表中选择一个学生
group-registration-documentation: 如果您想将一名学生加入群组，而您没有“管理员”权限，这名学生将在他确认您的邀请后加入群组。 如果你想获得“管理员”权限，请联系邮箱 revita@helsinki.fi
Master-a-language-by-learning-from-stori: 通过学习故事掌握一门语言
Revita: for language learning and suppor: 学习语言拯救濒危语言的工具
choose-settings-template: 公开和私人故事的使用
exercise-setting-automatic: Revita 针对您水平的设置
choose-settings-template-info: 注意：在小组的资料库中，练习是由教师选择、设置和控制的。
cefr-level-documentation: 根据“CEFR”等级，系统会给我们选择练习。
exercise-density-documentation:
此滑块显示每个段落中给出了多少练习：
“难”表示更多练习。 “容易”意味着更少。
title_in_use: 具有该名称的文章已存在。请重命名并重试。
click-to-add-site-to-favourites: 将该网站添加到收藏夹！
wrong_language: 该文章的语言与正在学习的语言不一致
story-unshared: 文章已从小组图书馆内删除
empty_tokens: 很抱歉，Revita从该网站提取文章失败。请将文章粘贴至.TXT文件中并上传文件到Revita。
XXX: 上传的文件太大。最大文件大小为{:.2f} KB
story-remove-confirm: 文章将从收藏中永久删除，您要继续吗？
remove-story-from-group-warning: 文章将从小组图书馆中被删除{group}
need-to-be-teacher-in-group-to-share: 只有成为老师才能分享文章到小组
news-bell-info-popup-text: 你有{numUnreadNews}未读信息，点击查看消息！
post-answers-error: 下载文章失败、请检查文章来源再试一次。
preview-mode-info: 可以点击突出显示的单词和短语, 看看系统提供的关于它们的练习
review-mode-info: 可以点击突出显示的单词和短语，砍砍自己以前做练习的回答
user-unblock-confirmation: 确认要将 {user} 移出您的屏蔽名单吗？
invitation-failure-explanation: 邀请失败的原因可能是：邮箱无效或者该邮箱未注册Revita
multiple-emails-separated-by-space: 多个邮箱地址请用空格分隔
users-already-blocked: 该邮箱地址下的用户已经被屏蔽: {users}
following-users-not-found: 无法找到该邮箱地址下的用户: {users}
no-followed-users: 您还没有关注任何用户
Show my username in leaderboards: 在排行榜上显示用户名
password-reset-instructions: 输入电子邮箱地址。Revita将会发送更换密码链接给你
pw-reset-for-registered-users-only: 只有在注册后才可以更换密码
enter-more-about-problem: Revita团队将会查看您遇到问题的页面，请简短描述一下这个问题。
thank-you-for-reporting-problem: 感谢您的报错！我们会尽快修复该问题。
multiple-chances-when-practicing: 允许反复尝试故事中的练习
how-many-cards-per-practice-session: 每个练习中的卡片数量
Only on demand: 仅在需要的时候进行发音示范
blocking-users-information: 被屏蔽的用户不能向你分享文章
could-not-find-story-to-accept: 没有找到你正尝试接收的文章
following-users-information: 如果你关注一个用户，你将自动接收他跟你分享的任何故事。
paused-click-to-resume:
已暂停

点击 ► 继续
test-results-remove-confirmation: 测试结果将永久删除，你确定要继续吗？
control-story-info-text: 故事中的练习由老师指定。请在计时结束前回答每一段的练习。回答错误时你将得到额外尝试的时间。
exhaustive-test-info-text: 长测试中包含老师指定主题的问题。每一个问题请在30秒内作答。
adaptive-test-info-text:
快速测试能帮助你了解你的水平。Revita将根据之前的回答选择50-75个问题。每一个问题请在30秒内作答。

测试结束后将展示结果以及对你CEFR水平的预估。
tour-sidebar-message: 你可以在这里打开侧边栏，它包含有用的设置和功能。
tour-practice-now-message: 这里你可以开始练习随机故事。
tour-learning-language-message: 这里可以选择想学习的语言。你可以随时更改它。
tour-library-message: 图书馆里有你上传的所有故事，您班级和老师的文章以及我们为你预加载的一些示例文本。
tour-begin-practicing-message:
现在你可以开始练习了！

点击此图标重新开始导览。如需查看线上帮助，点击信息图标下的帮助按钮

请注册并登录，以便Revita能保存你的
  • 文章和卡片，
  • 设置和偏好，
  • 技能水平和进步。

Bon voyage!
tour-flashcards-message:
当您点击文章中陌生的单词，Revita会自动创建生词卡片。

你可以在这里练习它们！
tour-welcome-message:
Revita通过你所选的故事来帮助你学习语言。

现在将为你展示它的主要功能 →
tour-welcome-message-OLD:
Revita通过你所选的故事来帮助你学习语言。

现在将为你展示它的主要功能

（此导览需要1分钟） →
tour-add-content-message: 你可以添加并练习任意 故事。Revita将根据你上传的文章创建练习。
apologies-no-translation: （很抱歉，未找到该单词的翻译）
click-on-words-near-the-exercises-to-exp: 单击任意生词以获取翻译⇒ 该单词将保存至你的卡片中！
other_error: 抱歉，加载该故事时出错。请稍后再试。
check-for-non-latin-characters: 文件名只能包含拉丁字母。
warning-for-anonymous-users: 只有注册用户可以保存故事以便下次使用。
paste-text-upload-instructions: 请粘贴故事。文章标题<b>至少3个字符</>。文章本体<b>最少50个字符</>。
file-upload-instructions:
请选择包含该故事的文件：
  • 文件扩展名应为.TXT 或 .DOCX （不支持其他扩展名）
  • Revita 将使用第一行作为故事的标题
upload-from-web-instructions: Revita 将尝试从该网页查找故事。如果失败，或者结果包含不需要的文本，请使用下面的“粘贴文本”框手动输入故事。
wordnest-info-text: 词族中主要的单词在左边，它们派生的单词和其他单词在下边稍微靠右的位置。更常见的单词用颜色更暗的字体表示，不常见的单词则用颜色更亮的字体表示。点击链接可以查看相关的词族。
delete-account-information: 删除账户将永久删除你的文章。请在下方输入密码确认删除。
Exaplanation-library-search: Here you can search for text contained in the story!
explanation-library-search: 您可在此处按文中词句搜索
explanation-inside-textbox-upload-cut-pa:
文章的第一行是标题并应以句号结尾。

空出一行，正文从这个空行后开始...
explanation-upload-from-file:
请确认文件符合以下格式：
文章的第一行是标题并应以句号结尾。

空出一行，正文从这个空行后开始...
story-completed-encouragement: 恭喜！您已经完成了这篇文章！
stories-covered-encouragement: 到目前为止您已经完成了{stories}篇文章。
words-seen-encouragement: 在您学习过的文章中，您遇见了{vocabulary_seen}个单词。你是否需要回顾一下您的
first-story-covered-encouragement: 恭喜！您已经完成了您的第一篇文章！
words-interacted-encouragement: 您已经练习到了{nWords}个新单词。是否需要回顾您的
would-you-like-to-continue-story:
您上次在学习的文章是：{story}.
是否继续?
review-encouragement: 您是否希望回顾一下您的词汇进度?
vocabulary-total-explanation: 每个难度下，您总共查看生词的数量
vocabulary-visit-explanation: 您索取翻译的单词数量或者练习单词卡的数量
vocabulary-seen-explanation: 您在练习中总计遇见单词的的数量
vocabulary-flashcard-explanation: 您在单词卡中掌握单词的数量
vocabulary-view-explanation:
这幅图展示了您的词汇能力
  • 当前
  • 稍早一些
您可以通过日历控件选择稍早的一个时间点
would-you-like-to-continue:
您上次在学习的文章是：
{story}
leaderboard-ranking-encouragement:
恭喜！
您在本周的排名中位列第{userRanking}位。
review-recent-stories: 你想回顾一下最近联系过的文章吗？
timeline-explanation: 此图展示了您在选定时间段内的练习进度和您每天练习所获得的Elo 分数
hex-map-explanation: 此热力图展示了在选定时间段内不同知识点的掌握情况
exercise-history-explanation: 此表展示了您在选定时间段内每个月对于不同知识点的表现
test-history-explanation: 此表展示了您在选定时间段内每个月在测验里的表现
max-questions-exceeded: 输入的问题数字大于问题数量
empty-snippets-warning: 注意：一些段落没有练习
multiple-choice-tooltip: 选项将以字母顺序呈现给学生
multiple-choice-validation: 请至少再添加一个选项
story-completed-to-blue-flashcards: 在这个故事中你遇见了{nWords}个新单词，这些单词您并没有查过词典。您可以从这{nWords}个新单词获得奖励！让我们来联系一下 →
disable-recmd-tooltip: 可稍后在个人设置里改变设置
all-correct-flashcards: Well done! Would you like to
some-incorrect-flashcards: 一些回答错了，你是否希望
story-title-already-taken:
文章标题已占用
请重新选择一个标题
mastering-new-words:
恭喜!
您即将掌握{nWords}个新单词
list-of-recent-stories: Last time you were working on:
review-recent-completed-stories: 你想回顾一下最近联系过的文章吗？
continue-last-story-left-in-the-middle: 您可以继续练习上次的文章
previous-stories-blue-cards:
您之前遇见了{nWords}个新单词，在练习文章
  • {story}
的过程中，您并未要求过这些单词的翻译
您可以通过练习这{nWords}个单词获得奖励!
让我们来练习其中5个吧 →
hide-home-page-recommendations: 不要在主页上显示推荐活动
good-job-blue-flashcards:
恭喜!
您将从掌握这篇文章里的{nWords}个单词获得奖励!
annotation-remove-confirm: 您是否确定删除这篇笔记？
story-top-topics: 通过练习这篇文章，你将掌握这些概念
red-bar-explanation: 练习更多的故事以提高分数
blue-bar-explanation: 练习这些“蓝色单词卡”，它们将变为绿色→ <it>已掌握</it>的单词
green-bar-explanation: 练习更多的单词卡以提高分数
FEEDBACK-TUA-Temporaalirakenne: 这是表达过去时间的结构(Temporaalirakenne)
overview-vocabulary-explanation: 您至今为止已经练习过的所有单词：掌握的和未掌握的
offer-adaptive-test: 或者做一个小测试以估计您的等级
daily-stories-explanation: 您可能会读的一些新故事
upload-daily-story: 上传至我的个人图书馆
new-group-story-encouragement: 一片新的故事已被上传到您的班级组
beta-language-warning: 请注意：{language} 正在开发中
story-title-validation: 文章标题至少需要包含3个字符
Author: 作者
comments-on-story-explanation: This story has notes and comments made by you (or others)
select-lesson-story: 为你的课程选择一篇文章
no-available-exercise: 该课程暂无更多练习，Revita稍后会添加更多练习，敬请期待！

explanations-popup-flashcard-elo: 这是你的词汇 / 单词卡 ELO： 你可以点击此处来查看更多细节。
practice-now-explanation: Revita will choose a random story for you to practice — you can select its topic (or from which library)
tour-progress-message: 您可以在此处查看您的语法和词汇进度
tour-lessons-message: 您可以在此处查看课程。在每个课程中，您可以专注练习某些特定主题
library-tour-story-message: 您可以在此处查看文章并练习
library-tour-stars-message: 星星表示难度：一颗星星为简单，三颗星星为难
library-tour-review-message: 在练习文章之后，您可以回顾您的回答
tour-end-message: 点击此处重新开始本导览
library-page-welcome-message: Welcome to the library page - here you can see all your stories
library-tour-welcome-message: 欢迎来到图书馆，您可以在此浏览您的所有文章
progress-tour-welcome-message: 此页面展示您的学习进度图。您和您的老师随时查看此图。
progress-tour-dates-message: 您可以在此处选择图标的时间跨度
Expressions of time, place and manner. P: 时间地点行为方式。无前置词词组。
practice-tour-welcome-message: 此导览将为您介绍预览页和练习页的功能
practice-tour-topics-message: 点击此处将为您展示文章中的主要语法主题
practice-tour-translations-message: 当您点击文章中的生词时，其翻译将会展示与此
practice-tour-mobile-translations-messag: 当您点击文章中的单词时，其翻译将会展示与屏幕底部
practice-tour-start-practice-message:

practice-tour-exercise-box-message: 您将会在练习中遇见选择题，填空题和听力题
practice-tour-exercise-message: 当您点击练习时，您有机会要求提示
practice-tour-check-answers-message: 当您王城全部练习时，单击此处提交答案
practice-tour-progress-message: 此处显示您在文章练习中的进度
explanations-popup-story-irt:

点击此处查看你的进度以回顾你过去一段时间的练习效果。
grammar-topics-message: 这些事该课程包括的语法主题
grammar-performance-message: 此处展示您的当前准确率
lesson-setup-message: 您可以在此处设置课程
practise-lesson-message: Click here to practice the lesson.
grammar-practice-message: 此处练习与文章练习类似，不过所有练习将围绕本课程的语法主题
practice-lesson-message: 点击此处开始练习本课程

streak-done: 您已经连续练习了{daysStreaked}天了!
lesson-story-topic-message: 您可以在此处设置课程
lesson-vocab-diff-message: 您可以在此调节课程中出现的词汇难度

click-here-to-see-progress-explanation: 点击此处查看你的进度
click-to-see-TOUR-explanation: 点击此处开始使用教程
click-to-change-learning-language-explan: 点击此处更改学习语言
first-time-meta-help-message: 这不是最佳选项，我们将提供一些提示
experimental-elicitation-question:
This task has several challenging points. Choose one. If you feel that the tips are not helpful, don't worry! You can choose different advice next time.
Which of these would you like to get more help with?
elicitation-construct-specific-details: I can’t find the right place in the text
elicitation-construct-deducing-vocabular: I don’t understand the meaning of some words
move-to-next-set-of-reading-items: Now we move to the next set of tasks.
experimental-after-first-mediation-open-: 提示对你回答问题有帮助么？有怎样的帮助？
experimental-after-last-item-slider-ques: 在回答了这些问题后，你觉得提示有用么
experimental-end-of-set-open-ended-quest: 之前的提示有改变你回答问题的方式么？若有，如何改变？
在回答问题时，你有新想法么？
你对提示有什么感受么？你觉得该如何改进呢？
control-intro-to-open-ended-questions: 做的不错，我们还需要你回答最后几个问题
control-end-of-set-open-ended-question-a: 你对你的回答有多少信心？
control-end-of-set-open-ended-question-c: 你更希望有些怎样的提示？
elicitation-construct-specific-details-N: 我找不到答案相对应的文字
Home-Continue-Activity-EXPLANATION: 点击此处继续之前的练习
Home-Dive-In-EXPLANATION: Revita将会在此处根据您之前的练习随机选择文章进行练习
Home-Lessons-EXPLANATION: 您可以进入此处开始语法专项练习。练习将从您的文章中挑选
Home-Adaptive-Test-EXPLANATION: 您可以在此处开始一个快速测试。大约会有50-60题。我们将根据您的测试生成一个成绩
Home-Flashcards-EXPLANATION: 你可以在此处练习单词卡
Home-Library-EXPLANATION: 这里是您的图书馆，收藏了您和您的老师们至今为止上传的所有文章，我们还提供一份公共文章合集
Sidebar-user-score-EXPLANATION: 您的当前等级，点击查看进度
flashcards-go-to-all-cards-EXPLANATION:
In this story, you saw some words and did not not ask for their translations. We want to assume that you probably know these words. We use these 5 special blue cards to check that you know all of these words. If you answer these 5 cards correctly, you will get credit for all the words you know in this story.
Click here if you want to go back to working with all your flashcards.
flashcards-edit-card-list-EXPLANATION: Here you can review and modify the complete list of your flashcards
flashcards-add-cards-EXPLANATION: Here you can add any new words you like to your flashcards
flashcards-translate-cards-EXPLANATION: Exercise with flashcards: translate words into the language you chose
flashcards-quick-cards-EXPLANATION: Click here for quick flashcards: no need to translate — answer only "I know this word" or  "I don't know"
customize-lesson-configurations-EXPLAIN: Click here to configure the lesson: which topics do you want to practice?
customize-story-practice-EXPLAIN: Select what you would like to practice...
enter-question-to-chatbot: Ask a question from the chatbot ...
chatbox-initial-instruction: Click on an exercise — then you can get hints here, and ask any questions you have about the exercise.
no-available-exercise-OLD: 该课程暂无更多练习，Revita稍后会添加更多练习，敬请期待！
chatbot-response-error: 连接超时，请在稍后重试
story-blue-cards:
您之前遇见了{nWords}个新单词，在练习文章
  • {story}
的过程中，您并未要求过这些单词的翻译
您可以通过练习这{nWords}个单词获得奖励!
让我们来练习其中5个吧 ！
word-nest-EXPLANATION: Click here to see the Word Nest — related words.
DDLANG-onboarding-message: THIS IS AN OLD VERSION OF THE ABOVE INTRO TEXT (DONT USE THIS): The following exercises will help you improve your English skills. The first stage is reading comprehension — 20 short tasks. We will also ask you what you think about the tasks and the feedback that you receive about them, so that we can improve the tasks. You don't have to complete all the tasks in one session; you can exit and return to them, and continue from the point where you left off. After completing the reading exercises, you can continue with various tasks that focus on structures and vocabulary. You will get detailed instructions about these tasks when you are ready to start working on them. Later, you will be able to continue practicing reading comprehension with new exercises; we will let you know when they are available.
click-on-words-near-the-exercises-to-exp: 单击任意生词以获取翻译⇒ 该单词将保存至你的卡片中！
select-lesson-themes-and-vocabulary: 选择课程内容主题和词汇难度
click-here-to-configure-lesson: Click here to configure your lesson →
disabled-flashcard-btn-explanation: 没有单词卡。请点击文本中不认识的单词，它们将被添加到单词卡中！
ddlang-introductory-text:
How does the Revita/DD-LANG system help you?
Revita/DD-LANG develops your English skills, particularly reading and writing. It also helps you to prepare for the Matriculation Examination.
You will receive feedback that helps you become better a reader/writer. If you get the same feedback many times, don't worry: It just helps you to remember the advice.
You can exit and come back to the exercises at any time.
What should you do next?
Start by choosing Reading Practice. Other activities (e.g. Flashcards, Library) are not yet ready for English. Take the Tour (upper right-hand corner of the screen) for more details.
Reading Practice includes two sets of 10 exercises. After completing them, you can practice your grammar and vocabulary. We will let you know when more reading (and also writing) exercises are ready for you.
TOS-title: Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, and Consent to Participate in Research
TOS-consent-title: Consent to Participate in Research Study
TOS-consent-content: By using the DD-LANG tasks in Revita, you agree to participate in our research study. You consent to the collection and use of your data for research purposes, as outlined in the privacy notices and research information provided below. Participation in this research is a requirement for using the DD-LANG tasks in Revita.
TOS-research-content: The purpose of this study is to improve the effectiveness of language learning. Your participation will involve the collection of data related to your use of the DD-LANG tasks, including what you do in the system, your performance metrics, and the feedback you give. Participation in this research is fully voluntary. You may withdraw your consent to participate in the research at any time and for any reason.
TOS-privacy-content:
We are committed to protecting your privacy. The data collected from your use of DD-LANG tasks will be used solely for research purposes and to improve our services. This data may include personally identifiable information such as your username, email address, and performance data. All data will be anonymized before any research analysis or reporting. Your data will be stored securely and will only be accessible to authorized researchers involved in this study. We will not share your personal information with any third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law.
See X and Y for more information
TOS-background-questions-content: Before starting the exercises, we ask you to answer some background questions.
TOS-question-1: Question 1: How many years have you studied in lukio?
TOS-question-1-4: this is my fourth (or more) year
TOS-question-2a: Which obligatory English courses have you taken? Mark all that you have taken (including the one that you may be taking at the moment);
TOS-question-2b: Which optional English courses have you taken? Mark all that you have taken (including the one that you may be taking at the moment)
TOS-question-3: What is your latest course grade in English?
correct-first-attempts: Number of correct answers on first attempt (no hints)
first-attempt-correct-rate: Correct rate on first attempt (no hints)
overall-correct-rate: Rate of correct answers of all answers (including with hints)
average-hints-used: Average number of hints needed to get correct answer
test-completed: Report: Your performance on reading comprehension exercises
explain-your-performance: Your current level of performance on this topic
ddlang-introductory-text-experimental:
How does the Revita/DD-LANG system help you?
Revita/DD-LANG develops your English skills, particularly reading and writing. It also helps you to prepare for the Matriculation Examination.
You will receive feedback that helps you become better a reader/writer. You may get the same feedback many times: This helps you to remember the advice.
You can exit and come back to the exercises at any time. Just close the Revita window in your browser to exit.
What should you do next?
Start by choosing Reading Practice. Some of the other activities may not yet be ready for English. Take the Tour (upper right-hand corner of the screen) for more details.
Reading Practice includes two sets of 10 exercises. After completing them, you can practice your grammar and vocabulary by using texts in the Library or by using texts that you can upload to Revita yourself. We will let you know when more reading (and also writing) exercises are ready for you.
Remember that your goal is not to just to complete tasks but to learn something new from them.
You can change the language of the interface and feedback to Finnish in the Settings (via the menu in the upper left corner of the screen).
ddlang-introductory-text-control:
How does the Revita/DD-LANG system help you?
Revita/DD-LANG develops your English skills, particularly reading and writing. It also helps you to prepare for the Matriculation Examination.
You will receive feedback on how well you did on each exercise.
You can exit and come back to the exercises at any time. Just close the Revita window in your browser to exit.
What should you do next?
Start by choosing Reading Practice. Other activities (e.g. Flashcards) are not yet ready for English. Take the Tour (upper right-hand corner of the screen) for more details.
Reading Practice includes two sets of 10 exercises. We will let you know when more reading (and also writing) exercises are ready for you.
You can change the language of the interface and feedback to Finnish in the Settings (via the menu in the upper left corner of the screen).
DDLANG-onboarding-message-OLD:
THIS IS AN OLD VERSION OF THE ABOVE INTRO TEXT (DONT USE THIS):
The following exercises will help you improve your English skills. The first stage is reading comprehension — 20 short tasks. We will also ask you what you think about the tasks and the feedback that you receive about them, so that we can improve the tasks. You don't have to complete all the tasks in one session; you can exit and return to them, and continue from the point where you left off. After completing the reading exercises, you can continue with various tasks that focus on structures and vocabulary. You will get detailed instructions about these tasks when you are ready to start working on them. Later, you will be able to continue practicing reading comprehension with new exercises; we will let you know when they are available.

flashcard-upload-instructions:
请选择包含单词卡的文件：
  • 文件扩展名应为.TXT 或 .DOCX （不支持其他扩展名）
  • Revita 将使用第一行作为卡组的标题
  • 每行包含一个词组, 和解释并用分号分隔; 例如:
    • word;translation 1; translation 2; ...
